assessment_item.title: LAAPAR-Q16-NPK என்பது எதைக் குறிக்கும்?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

NPK என்பது எதைக் குறிக்கும்?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

நைட்ரஜன், புரதம், கைனெட்டின்            

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1675"},{"text":"

நைட்ரஜன், புரதம், பொட்டாசியம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1676"},{"text":"

 நைட்ரஜன், பொட்டாசியம், கைனெட்டின்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1686"},{"text":"

நைட்ரஜன், பாஸ்பரஸ், பொட்டாசியம்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1691"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"LAAPAR-Q16-NPK என்பது எதைக் குறிக்கும்?","title":"LAAPAR-Q16-NPK என்பது எதைக் குறிக்கும்?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
